alert.note: Alert for McCreary; Whitley (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 28 at 9:01PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT PARTS OF MCCREARY...WHITLEY...AND PULASKI COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A snow squall accompanied by winds of 20 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 900 PM EST, a snow squall was over Cumberland Falls S.P., or 9 miles northwest of Williamsburg moving southeast at 20 MPH. THIS SQUALL WILL BE NEAR... Deering around 905 PM EST. Krupp and Duckrun around 910 PM EST. Clio and Walden around 915 PM EST. Redbird, Bounty and Goldbug around 920 PM EST. Rockholds around 925 PM EST. Williamsburg, Bon, Jellico Creek and Wofford around 930 PM EST. Perkins around 935 PM EST. Emlyn, Yaden, Suttons Mill, Julip and Ayers around 940 PM EST. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. &&
